body: Thank you for taking the time to speak with our Hackney contact tracing team.↵↵You can find a written version of the isolation guidance at:↵https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/self-isolation-and-treatment/when-to-self-isolate-and-what-to-do/↵↵Information on statutory sick pay can be found here:↵https://www.gov.uk/statutory-sick-pay↵↵If you have any other issues relating to COVID, you can call the Hackney coronavirus support line on 0208 356 3111
